message.body: Are you feelin better now?
Not really. But I'm sorry for leaving you guys like that. That was wrong
Yeah we were like wtf cus u never came back. It's okay I read about sociopaths on the train ride home instead
Did you go to the 2 train cuz I went to the Q
Yeah cus they were going that way too
I get that. It's normal. And like you never have to feel obliged to take the train with me just saying
Yeah I just wanted to leave
No that's not it. I like having company on the train. I just didn't want to play frisbee lolol
Haha yeah I get that. And good cus I like it too. It makes the ride a lot shorter
Was everyone really mad at me
Not reaaaaally mad. But like slightly but also like what? Like we were tryin to figure out what we had said
Yeah like when he called you an asshole?
I was annoyed about a lot of things all day. But mostly by the way Jordan was acting towards me. It really didn't have to do with you or will
Yeah he thought that could've been it
Pretty much
I just didn't understand or appreciate any of the things he was saying to me all day and I did not want to deal with them. To put it broadly
Well from what I was there for I can understand that. I'm sorry. I think he's just been really out of it cus he's been kinda like off
Yeah yeah yeah he's "out of it" every fucking day, boo hoo get over it. But it's not your fault, and I overreacted
Me too. I really hope not
Maybe that's the real Jordan. But like I hope it's not
Cus like I like in it Jordan so much more
Me too! But he tries to blame his "out of it"-ness on me and I'm like nope
That's so not okay. He didn't tell me it was cus of you. But you guys have bad timing
THE WORST TIMING. We really need to talk to each other like human beings. Preferably tonight
Yes I think that's a great idea.
Cus when you work you guys are both awesome
Haha thanks. He's definitely my best friend for a reason. But you know, shit happens
Yeah and he's my boyfriend for a reason but I get that cus I've been in similar situations
Sigh. Life.
Yeah. So complicated. Although you have it the easiest http://whatever.scalzi.com/2012/05/15/straight-white-male-the-lowest-difficulty-setting-there-is/
No it's just something Jordan recently sent me
Like why do you have this bookmarked lmfao
Hahaha ok. But yeah it's pretty easy being me obvi
Then why does life even exist
I've noticed... Nah it's not easy being anyone
They should
Idk. They don't explain this stuff in bio
Like obvi
Gabby just does not want to hang out with me tommorow
She's not like being mean about it. She's just telling me that she has to go to the park with you and Jordan tomorrow
What's she saying?
I want to take her out but I don't have any money do I think I should wait until I do
Well I mean multiple people are going I think so just come too. And like what would you do instead?
Battle of the bands. I kinda have to go. It's cool if she doesn't want to go, it just bugs me that it's Jordan who is keeping her away from me. As silly as that sounds
Oh. Well it's not only him (and it's silly but understandable) like we made these plans a while ago. Like skip battle of the bands
Idk I'll see what happens. It's not that big of a deal
No it's not. Also ask her to hang out another time this weekend or something (but once you have money cus I know she's like big on that)
Haha I know. I just keep thinking that I've missed my chance. But there's still time
You haven't missed your chance but the sooner the better
